snippet: Energy stocks were up. The Federal Reserve made it clear that it was open to raising its benchmark rate yet this year.
abstract: Stocks rise strongly after Federal Reserve says it will consider raising its benchmark interest rate at December meeting.
lead_paragraph: Energy stocks were up. The Federal Reserve made it clear that it was open to raising its benchmark rate yet this year.

headline.print_headline: Markets Resume Their Climb After Signals From the Fed
headline.main: Modest Gain for the Market as Oil Prices Jump
